name: Domain Reminder
author: Everett Bryant

sections.description:
This is a a simple plugin that is used for setting a reminder of when your domain is going to expire. You set the date once and it will display it in the panel. This is only the first version and we will be looking to expand some of the features available.

This includes:

  • A countdown that will give you a ten and then a five day reminder
  • A smoother look

If there are any questions or if you are looking for more updates about plugins then go here blackthought.posterous.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set the date that the domain expires.

short_description: Simple plugin that allows a user to remind them when the blog's domain is about to expire
